sentences.sentence: A sentence can be divided up into meaningful seg we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s.
sentences.translation: 一个句子可以划分成有意义的各个部分。

sentences.sentence: Instead of rushing at life, I wanted something more meaningful.
sentences.translation: 我不想在生活中忙忙碌碌，而想做更有意义的事。

sentences.sentence: Upon the utterance of this word, Dan and Harry exchanged a quick, meaningful look.
sentences.translation: 这个字一出口，丹和哈里马上交换了一个意味深长的眼神．
